BuffData.DynamicTooltip:
Battle FuryTryndamere gains 5 Fury for striking a unit or 10 Fury for a critical strike, and 10 extra Fury for killing a unit. After 8 seconds of being out of combat, Tryndamere loses 5 Fury every second.

Each point of Fury grants +0.35% Critical Chance.
